column1: '''MBAR''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "dwell; to make a decision". [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] notes that English "'[s]ettle' is in fact
column2: in its various branches of meaning
column3: a very close rendering of the sense of base √MBAR".<ref name=PEE>{{PE|Eldarin}}

column1: In the ''Qenya Lexicon'' appears the root MBARA
column2: from which was derived [[Qenya]] ''mar'' ("dwelling of men
column4: the Earth").<ref>{{PE|12}}</ref> In the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']] appear the root MBAR- signifying "dwell
